text: Ndu kaŋgi, nza fhum mbara muuŋgi, nza ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ki fhu, nza buni daasui. Satan nza guigim, nza Fhe Bakɨmen tuav zɨn vui fhu. Nza kha tɨva muuŋgi, nza fhura ndavi khavav mbarkɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgir ŋaara gumgi kav, ndavi khavav mbarkɨrga vuzvugi zɨn vui. Nza fhura vhegap, harigi gumgi ga nzuav ndavi mbarɨgi tuav, nza ana zɨn vui. Gumgi panan nza kim, nza bevbevira panan harigi gumgi ga ki.
